name: COVID-19 (Pharaohs exe)
description:
The game is a person who is wandering inside a city infected with the virus and is trying to kill the virus to reach the antidote, which will accelerate to get rid of the virus

L   for light

j   for jump

f    to pick medicine

left mouse for shoot 

forward - back -   left -right  to move
